body:
Interesting.  It's appears to be a little complicated.

The equivalent operations in `np` also give `-inf`:
```
In [10]: np.log(np.sum(np.exp(np.array([]))))
Out[10]: -inf
```

`scipy.misc.logsumexp` docs suggest to use `scipy.special.logsumexp` instead which for my version gives an error:
```
scipy.special.logsumexp(np.array([]))
ValueError: zero-size array to reduction operation maximum which has no identity
```
